results.title: Combination of endovascular graft exclusion and drug therapy in AAA with hypertension or hyperglycemia.
results.text_hl: The size of @<m>DISEASE_Achalasia_Addisonianism_Alacrimia_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536008 @@@AAAs@@@ reduced after endovascular graft exclusion.

citations.NLM: Wang D, Qu B, He T. Combination of endovascular graft exclusion and drug therapy in AAA with hypertension or hyperglycemia. Minerva Cardioangiol. 2017 Aug;65(4):348-354. PMID: 28146143
citations.BibTeX: @article{28146143, title={Combination of endovascular graft exclusion and drug therapy in AAA with hypertension or hyperglycemia.}, author={Wang D and Qu B and He T}, journal={Minerva Cardioangiol}, volume={65}, number={4}, pages={348-354}}

results.title: [Non-fatal hyperkalemia in lactic acidosis due to metformin overdose. Report of one case].
results.text_hl: We report a 74-year-old man with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@diabetes mellitus type 2@@@ and @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@, who recently underwent coronary bypass surgery due to severe @<m>DISEASE_Achalasia_Addisonianism_Alacrimia_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536008 @@@triple vessel disease@@@ receiving cardiological and combined antidiabetic therapy, including @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ 4 g/day.

citations.NLM: Díaz R, Vega J, Goecke H. [Non-fatal hyperkalemia in lactic acidosis due to metformin overdose. Report of one case]. Rev Med Chil. 2015 Mar;143(3):391-5. PMID: 26005828
citations.BibTeX: @article{26005828, title={[Non-fatal hyperkalemia in lactic acidosis due to metformin overdose. Report of one case].}, author={Díaz R and Vega J and Goecke H}, journal={Rev Med Chil}, volume={143}, number={3}, pages={391-5}}

results.title: Editor's Choice - Metformin Prescription is Associated with a Reduction in the Combined Incidence of Surgical Repair and Rupture Related Mortality in Patients with Abdominal Aortic Aneurysm.
results.text_hl: A randomised controlled trial is needed to definitively test whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ reduces @DISEASE_Aortic_Aneurysm_Abdominal @DISEASE_MESH:D017544 @@@AAA@@@ related clinical events in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with small @<m>DISEASE_Achalasia_Addisonianism_Alacrimia_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536008 @@@AAAs@@@ who do not have @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@.

citations.NLM: Golledge J, Morris DR, Pinchbeck J, Rowbotham S, Jenkins J, Bourke M, Bourke B, Norman PE, Jones R, Moxon JV. Editor's Choice - Metformin Prescription is Associated with a Reduction in the Combined Incidence of Surgical Repair and Rupture Related Mortality in Patients with Abdominal Aortic Aneurysm. Eur J Vasc Endovasc Surg. 2019 Jan;57(1):94-101. PMID: 30174271
citations.BibTeX: @article{30174271, title={Editor's Choice - Metformin Prescription is Associated with a Reduction in the Combined Incidence of Surgical Repair and Rupture Related Mortality in Patients with Abdominal Aortic Aneurysm.}, author={Golledge J and Morris DR and Pinchbeck J and Rowbotham S and Jenkins J and Bourke M and Bourke B and Norman PE and Jones R and Moxon JV}, journal={Eur J Vasc Endovasc Surg}, volume={57}, number={1}, pages={94-101}}
